snippet: Solid performance in Europe helped the fashion group increase full-year revenue to a record 2.19 billion euros, against 2.09 billion euros in 2012.
lead_paragraph: Solid performance in Europe helped the fashion group increase full-year revenue to a record 2.19 billion euros, against 2.09 billion euros in 2012.

headline.main: Armani Reports Growth in Sales, and Pledges New Investment
headline.print_headline: * Reports sales growth in all brands in all markets
